description: Hard working studs Francesco D'Macho and Tyler Johnson fill their hunger on the job site by swapping blow jobs on their lunch break. Soon both men shed their clothes to reveal chiseled bodies, round, firm bubble-butts, and giant tools swinging between their legs. Johnson bends D'Macho over, fucks his ass and blows his load, only minutes before Supervisor Ross Hurston walks in and shows D'Macho who's the boss!
title: Wood Work, Scene #01
